title: FBI's McCabe stepping down amid attacks from Trump
text:
FBI's McCabe stepping down amid attacks from Trump 1:47pm IST - 02:23 
FBI Deputy Director Andrew McCabe, criticized by President Donald Trump for alleged bias against him and in favor of his 2016 Democratic opponent Hillary Clinton, has stepped down as the agency's No. 2 official.   
FBI Deputy Director Andrew McCabe, criticized by President Donald Trump for alleged bias against him and in favor of his 2016 Democratic opponent Hillary Clinton, has stepped down as the agency's No. 2 official.  //reut.rs/2DQQ5cI
